mapper.select: select r.rolename from user u inner join user_role ur on u.uid=ur.uid inner join role r on r.rid=ur.rid where u.username=#{username}

select DISTINCT p.permision_name from user u inner join user_role ur on ur.uid=u.uid inner join role_permision rp on rp.rid=ur.rid inner join permision p on p.pid=rp.pid where p.permision_name is not null and u.username=#{username}
